name: His Revenge
description:
Hunted By the loss of Wife and in search to get back his daughter, he plays every role that he can perform as being a father, will his revenge worth it?? Will he get back his daughter?? 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is just the part 1 of the game if you purchase the game you will be able to access all upcoming parts for free
